reporting-org.narrative: Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture (UNESCO)
United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

title.narrative: Education Sector Analysis in support of Education Development Strategic Plan mid-term review

description.narrative: The education sector analysis will be conducted to support the mid-term review of Education Development Strategic Plan (EDSP) 2011 - 2020, in contribution to education reform in Viet Nam and post 2015 Sustainable Development Goals.The analysis will identify gaps in the EDSP implementation during 2011-2015 and propose solutions for future actions. In-depth thematic research on priorities issues will provide sound data to feed into the analysis. A joint education forum will provide a platform to share findings and recommendations from the analysis and present suggestions to adjust priorities and strategies for second EDSP phase implementation during 2016-2020.

participating-org.narrative: World Bank/International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

organisation.narrative: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)
